languages.text: "Вы, Лорд-капитан, так удивляетесь, словно впервые слышите о чем-то подобном".

traits.locale_text: "Вы, Лорд-капитан, так удивляетесь, словно впервые слышите о чем-то подобном".
traits.speaker: IdiraCompanion

languages.text: "Like you've never heard that one before, Lord Captain."
languages.original_text: "Вы, Лорд-капитан, так удивляетесь, словно впервые слышите о чем-то подобном".

traits.locale_text: "You, Lord Captain, are as surprised as if it is the first time you hear about something like this."
traits.speaker: IdiraCompanion

traits.locale_text: "You, Lord Captain, are as surprised as if it is the first time you hear about something like this."
traits.speaker: IdiraCompanion

traits.locale_text: "You, Lord Captain, are as surprised as if it is the first time you hear about something like this."
traits.speaker: IdiraCompanion

traits.locale_text: "You, Lord Captain, are as surprised as if it is the first time you hear about something like this."
traits.speaker: IdiraCompanion

traits.locale_text: "Like you've never heard that one before, Lord Captain."
traits.speaker: IdiraCompanion

traits.locale_text: "Like you've never heard that one before, Lord Captain."
traits.speaker: IdiraCompanion

languages.text: «Ni que fuera la primera vez que le dicen eso, Lord Capitán».
languages.original_text: "Like you've never heard that one before, Lord Captain."

traits.locale_text: «Usted, Lord Capitán, se sorprende como si fuese la primera vez que oye algo parecido».
traits.speaker: IdiraCompanion

languages.text: “说得就好像你以前从来没听说过一样，舰长大人。”
languages.original_text: "Like you've never heard that one before, Lord Captain."

traits.locale_text: “怎么，舰长大人？你惊讶得就好像第一次听说这种事情一样。”
traits.speaker: IdiraCompanion

languages.text: « Comme si c'était la première fois que vous entendiez une chose pareille, {mf|seigneur-capitaine|seigneure-capitaine}. »
languages.original_text: "Like you've never heard that one before, Lord Captain."

traits.locale_text: « Comme si c'était la première fois que vous entendiez une chose pareille, {mf|seigneur-capitaine|seigneure-capitaine}. »
traits.speaker: IdiraCompanion

languages.text: 「まるでこれまで聞いたことがないみたいだね、ロード・キャプテン」
languages.original_text: "Like you've never heard that one before, Lord Captain."

traits.locale_text: 「まるでこれまで聞いたことがないみたいだね、ロード・キャプテン」
traits.speaker: IdiraCompanion

languages.text: "Als hättet Ihr den noch nie gehört, Lord Captain."
languages.original_text: "Like you've never heard that one before, Lord Captain."

traits.locale_text: "Ihr, Lord Captain, seid so überrascht, als würdet Ihr das erste Mal von so etwas hören."
traits.speaker: IdiraCompanion

languages.text: "Sanki bunu daha önce duymamış gibi konuşuyorsun Lord Kaptan."
languages.original_text: "Like you've never heard that one before, Lord Captain."
